again from the Paris recent spring

around the world who many of them have
been under restrictions of dress such as

now at the Paris shows and while are
they having a terrific time dressing up

few people have a chance to wear evening

wary buy them in wearing them in the
daytime what it means the freedom that
has come as a fashion we see now it's

it's Oh wonderful but now often I people
wonder what do French women really where
well French woman never wore extremes
that I knew of a French woman dressed
very conservatively very beautifully cut
beautiful materials for what they
perceive as a stylish look for daytime
it might be a gold skirt with a black
sweater but it's so subtle the exciting
thing are all the women here seen here
from around the world that come to the

with such bravado you see marvelously
stylish women at the cafes and in the
tillery gardens they are now putting
down a white carpet so the guests very
expensive shoes aren't ruined by the

and the tourists are now lining up to
watch the guests arrive for the show
along with the NIA 200 or more
photographers when I started first
photographing outside the shows it was
because I was waiting to get in there
was nothing to do and i thought the

was the only one doing it for maybe the
